Texto: 
no acute distress.
clinical followup and chest radiographs as needed.
cxr: perimediastinal lucency; linear lucency in base of neck
ct: pneumomediastinum
pneumomediastinum
pneumomediastinum
infant recently transferred for further care.  
down's syndrome
this case represents a common situation where the finding was unexpected.  despite the significant pneumediastinum the patient remained clinically asymptomatic and did not require assisted breathing (endotracheal tube).
